title: coconut oil making machine - cold press - organic - extra virgin - www.coldpressoilmachines.com

tasks.task: Drive the hay wagon
subtasks: Seat comfortably in the driver's seat
Engage the clutch
Shift gears manually
Steer the vehicle using the steering wheel
Apply the brake pedal when necessary
Attach the hay bales to the wagon
Load hay bales onto the wagon bed

tasks.task: Raise the hay lift mechanism
subtasks: Position the lift lever
Operate the hydraulic system to lift hay onto the wagon
Align the hay with the wagon’s edge

tasks.task: Drive the hay wagon to the storage area
subtasks: Navigating through fields or pathways
Align the wagon under the appropriate storage structure

tasks.task: Unload hay from the wagon
subtasks: Position the wagon near the storage area
Disengage the hay lift
Release hay bales manually
Stack hay bales on the storage rack or floor

tasks.task: Clean the hay lift and wagon
subtasks: Remove hay residue from the lift mechanism
Wipe down the wagon bed
Tighten any loose hardware or check for wear and tear
Check the hydraulic fluids and replace if necessary

tasks.task: Apply rosin paper to the hay (tainting it for Tetra biofuel production)
subtasks: Prepare the rosin paper application tool
Cut the rosin paper into appropriate strips or pieces
Place the rosin paper on the hay piles
Roll or press the paper onto the hay to ensure adhesion

tasks.task: Toss the hay onto the wagon
subtasks: Position self near the hay pile
Grip hay bales or loose hay
Throw hay onto the moving or stationary wagon

tasks.task: Execute hay lifting using the fork (Parts 1-3)
subtasks: Approach the hay pile with the forklift
Lower the fork tines into the hay stack
Lift the hay a few inches, then lower it slightly to release some air
Repeat the lifting technique to fluff the hay, ensuring even loading

tasks.task: Quarter the hay bales
subtasks: Separate hay bales into four or more portions
Distribute the hay into different sections of the storage area

tasks.task: Separate hay from the fruit (apple???) (Not sure, vague reference)
subtasks: Examine hay bales for any attached fruits
Remove any apples or other fruits from the hay
